External Job Description
Purpose of Role
Find analytic opportunities by translating business ideas into analytics & clear use case outcomes

Dimensions:

Leadership Responsibilities and DRM
  • Works as a partner with and challenge the business owner by Leads and manages large shared on-shore and off-shore analytics delivery

Top 3-5 Accountabilities
  • Structure and identify the key business problems that data and analytics can help solve
  • Works as a partner with and challenge the business owner by asking the right questions
  • Provides insight to the business partner in terms of what “state of the art” looks like in data and analytics in their area
  • Understands strategic needs of the business, and is able to translate need into potential new use cases
  • Builds deep understanding of the product/functional area (e.g., Operations, Marketing) that the business partner is aligned with
  • Acts as the key contact within their BU for use case ideas and supports use case implementation teams
  • Knows the status of all use cases and ensures all feedback is gathered and addressed

Qualifications and Experience Required
  • Bachelor's Degree in a quantitative field (business, math, economics, finance, statistics, science, engineering) with Master’s Degree in statistics, math, computer science, business, economics or finance
  • 5+ years of experience in Business Analysis (former top tier consultant preferred), or Product Management (Media / Technology)
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, strong verbal and written communications skills - capable of developing well-structured communications and presentations, storytelling ability
  • Team oriented, goals oriented, and flexible with proven track record in collaborating with multiple stakeholders and driving results
